===Etymology===
From {{etyl|nan-hok|zh}} {{m|nan|ho̍h-ló}}, lit. "[[Fujian]] folk".

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=fúlǎo
|c=fuk1 lou2
|mn=ho̍h-ló
|cat=n
}}

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# [[Hoklo]], [[Hakka]] {{gloss|a Chinese topolect}}
# [[Han]] Chinese people who speak Hoklo.

====Usage notes====
* There are several way to write the word in Chinese; {{zh-l|河洛}} is prescribed by the Taiwanese government. [[Ho̍h-ló]] is the common [[Pe̍h-ōe-jī]] romanised spelling to the language and Hoklo culture.

====Synonyms====
* {{zh-l|河洛}}
* {{zh-l|鶴佬}}
